title: spack refuses to install mercurial on NERSC cori
body:
@BarrySmith @tgamblin

I'm trying to use spack to install the xsdk package on NERSC's cori, using the barry/xsdk branch.  Spack crashes during the last stage, installing pflotran, because it needs mercurial to fetch pflotran.  I tried using the mercurial module available on cori, which didn't work.  (See #1645 and #2811)  Then I tried having spack install mercurial for me, which it did not want to do.
